## 2023 Nosology Table

Here is the first version of the 2023 Nosology Table

```{r echo = FALSE}
#trying to make an interactive gt table
library(gt)
library(here)
library(readr)
Nosology_2023 <- read_rds(here("data/Nosology_2023.rds"))
nosology_tbl <-Nosology_2023 |>
  gt() |>
  opt_interactive()
#show the table
nosology_tbl
```
